```{r}

close_data <- read.csv("combined_close_data.csv") #import data
```

```{r}
close_data_2018 <- as.ts(close_data[1:251,3:421]) #select past year
plot(close_data_2018[, 3:10]) #plot first 8 series 
```
These do not appear to be stationary, so we take differences.

```{r}
close_2018_diff <- diff(close_data_2018) #difference
plot(close_2018_diff[, 3:10]) #plot first 8 differenced series 
close_2018_diff <- close_2018_diff[,-6] #drop ADT
```


## Extracting Factors with Principle Components

```{r}
Covar <- cov(close_2018_diff) #find covariance
PCA <- princomp(Covar) #take PCA of covariance
screeplot(PCA) 
head(PCA$sdev, 30) #view standard deviations of first 30 components
```
